ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: "Duplicate column alias" error with Airtable API quick import
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exist already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? Click base hamburger>import data>import data>credentials entered>All combinations tried from all boxes ticked, then progressively trying by removing the lowest box till only boxed ticked is "import data" ### Desired Behavior For the importer to succeed in importing my airtable base ### Project Details Cannot find any such details. Using a free web/cloud account ### Attachments ![Screenshot 2024-06-19 at 11 14 36](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/165793590/4ad08927-e935-4531-a96b-f853ee45be31)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #9740 from nocodb/nc-calendar-current-time fix: Calendar current time cursor is in the wrong place

COMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor: Additional informations added on Airtable Import feature that tells which column in which table was Duplicate column alias. Issue Refs: #8798
